item.description:
Ongoing ~ Mondays 9:30-10:45
Fee based on number of meetings.

Designed for expecting moms or parents of children up to 12 months.  The group is casual, comfortable, and informative.  Weekly topics of interest are based on the diversity of your questions, hopes, desires and concerns commonly found during the first year of parenthood. The first few years of a child’s life are critical for optimal development. It provides a foundation for success later in life. At Babies First, we endeavor to give you the layers of support necessary for both children and parents to realize their full potential. Meeting in the casual child friendly atmosphere of Mimi’s Place at LYSB, nursing moms and diaper changing is always welcome!
item.name: Babies First Group
